Content:
Hi everyone,

I'm a tall guy 196 cm or 6'5" and I weight about 105kg or 230 lbs naked. I'm thinking of buying a BMW F 900 GS next year. I really like the looks and specs of this bike, seems perfect for me, they ever offer a tall rally seat which is great.
I don't plan to go off road. But, since I'm bigger and heavier than an average rider, would I benefit from the Showa suspension that's included in the Enduro Package or is it only good for off-road?

Thanks

Title: As a tall rider, should I get better suspension for BMW F 900 GS?
Author: Martuson
